titles.title: Be Steadfast, Unmovable, And Always Abounding

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be steadfast, unmovable, and always abounding,
Abounding in the work of the Lord.
Be steadfast, unmovable, and always abounding,
Abounding in the work of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Knowing this that our labor in the Lord is not vain.
For we shall reap in due season if we faint not.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be steadfast, unmovable, and always abounding,
Abounding in the work of the Lord.
